title: Selecting a song from recently heard and going to YouTube Music does not take me to the song
content:
When I select a song that my phone has reported as "now playing" (great feature, by the way!) I am given a list of options, one of which is YouTube Music (my default music provider). When I tap on it, the phone opens YouTube Music but does not go to the song itself. Is this normal?

Also, when I tapped on "add to liked songs", it seemingly does not get added. I checked this by searching for the song in YouTube Music afterwards to check, and it had not added as a liked song.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
